title: Shishunki Bishoujo Gattai Robo Z-Mind
synopsis: Old school is back! And girl power reigns supreme! Ayame, Sumire, Renge, and Satsuki are charged with the protection of the Earth from a powerful new enemy. But these girls may be in for more than they`ve bargained for!
staff: [['Shimizu, Katsunori', ['Sound Director']], ['Iwanaga, Masako', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Yatate, Hajime', ['Original Creator']], ['Aoyama, Masanobu', ['Animation Director']]]
